sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Shows the KB field on Form Search Results</description> <name>Active KB Fields on Form Search Results</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if(!GlidePluginManager.isZboot()) gs.setProperty("com.snc.contextual_search.widget.form.show_meta_data", false);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-11-28 19:14:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>44ae9d3e0bd322005775aabcb4673a69</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Active KB Fields on Form Search Results</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Contextual Search" source="com.snc.contextual_search">67c7786c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_44ae9d3e0bd322005775aabcb4673a69</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-12-07 09:10:06</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>true</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Active KB Fields on Form Search Results
